name: Tower Toppler (Nebulus)
description:
Tower Toppler (Nebulus) is an action-arcade game developed by Hewson Consultants. It came out on 01-01-1988. US Gold published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
You can play Tower Toppler (Nebulus) on PC, Wii, Game Boy and Atari 7800.
Paul Chamberlain produced the game. Paul Chamberlain directed the game. David Whittaker and Matt Furniss scored the game.
